art_direction: Vintage horror photography with flickering candlelight

scenes.title: The Threshold of Flesh
scenes.text: I step into the abandoned hospital. The air hangs heavy, like the breath of some vast, unseen entity. Dust motes float in the dimness, symbols of forgotten lives unraveling into infinity. Silence presses in, building a tension that coils in my gut. Objects shift subtly in the corners—chairs scraping against floors without touch, as if the building itself pulses with incomprehensible life. Supernatural darkness creeps along the walls, tendrils that swallow light and whisper of eternal transformations. I feel eyes on me, not human, but from realms where flesh twists into impossible forms. A faint whisper echoes: 'Join the weave...'
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Cracked double doors at center front, slightly ajar; rusted metal gurney on the left floor; flickering candle on a dusty reception desk at right center; supernatural dark tendrils curling along the far wall shadows; floating dust motes in the air foreground.

choices.text: Follow the hallway to the operating wing

scenes.title: Corridors of Unraveling
scenes.text: I move down the hallway. The floor tiles buckle underfoot, like skin stretching over swelling bones. Anticipation builds in the quiet, each step echoing into vast emptiness. Moving objects clatter—syringes rolling across counters, drawn by invisible forces. The darkness here is alive, coiling around my legs, promising body horrors beyond comprehension. My skin itches, as if threads of some cosmic suture pull at my veins. A voice murmurs from the vents: 'Flesh is but clay for the eternal sculptors.' I see doors ahead, symbols of choices in this labyrinth of transformation.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Long narrow hallway stretching forward; buckled floor tiles at feet foreground; rolling syringes scattered on counter at left midground; coiling dark tendrils along ceiling center; wooden door with frosted glass at far end right.

scenes.title: Depths of the Cadaver Vault
scenes.text: I descend the stairs to the basement. The air grows colder, a metaphor for the void's indifferent grasp. Silence envelops me, tension mounting with each creak of the steps. Objects move here too—metal drawers sliding open on their own, revealing glimpses of altered remains. Supernatural darkness pools at the bottom, whispering of physical transformations that defy mortal limits. My fingers tingle, bones shifting subtly under skin. A distant sound hisses: 'Embrace the remaking... the cosmos calls your form.' Pathways branch in the gloom.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Steep concrete staircase descending forward; sliding metal drawer half-open on wall at left bottom; pooling dark shadows at base center; flickering candle stub on step railing right foreground; altered bone fragments visible in open drawer midground.

scenes.title: Desk of Distorted Memories
scenes.text: I approach the reception desk. Papers flutter without wind, symbols of lives unraveled by unknowable forces. The quiet builds dread, anticipation clawing at my mind. Darkness swirls around the edges, moving the objects—pens skittering like insects. My reflection in a shard of glass warps, skin bubbling in imagined horror. A whisper rises: 'See what you become.' My arm twitches, veins pulsing with alien rhythm. No way back now.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Wooden reception desk at center front; fluttering papers scattered on top surface; skittering pens rolling left edge; warped glass shard reflecting bubbling skin on right side; swirling dark tendrils in background corners.

scenes.title: Theater of Infinite Cuts
scenes.text: I enter the surgical theater. Instruments glint in the flickering light, metaphors for the cosmos carving flesh into new eternities. Silence reigns, tension thick as congealing blood. Objects levitate slightly—scalpels hovering, drawn by the darkness that fills the room. My body aches, ribs shifting like tectonic plates in a vast realignment. Blood seeps from a table, graphic yet restrained, hinting at horrors. A voice intones: 'Cut deeper... reveal the stars within.' I must choose quickly.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Central operating table with seeping blood stains at midground; hovering scalpel above table left; glinting instruments on tray right foreground; levitating darkness tendrils around ceiling center; cracked surgical lamp hanging overhead back.

choices.text: Grab a scalpel and fight the darkness

scenes.title: Ward of Writhing Forms
scenes.text: I push into the patient ward. Beds creak, empty yet alive with moving sheets, symbols of bodies lost to incomprehensible remaking. The quiet stretches, building unbearable anticipation. Supernatural darkness slithers between cots, transforming shadows into limbs that grasp. My skin crawls, literally—flesh rippling in waves of body horror. A moan echoes: 'We are all threads in the great weave.' Escape seems distant now.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Row of creaking metal beds along left wall; writhing sheets on central bed midground; slithering dark limbs from shadows right floor; rippling skin reflection in small mirror on far wall back; flickering candle on nightstand foreground left.

scenes.title: Drawer of Eternal Remains
scenes.text: I pull open a drawer. Inside, a cadaver stares back, its form twisted—limbs elongated into impossible spirals, graphic details of split skin revealing cosmic voids within. Silence amplifies the horror, tension peaking. Objects rattle nearby, darkness pulling them toward me. My own body begins to change, bones cracking softly. A whisper laughs: 'You are next in the collection.' No turning back.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Open metal drawer at center front; twisted cadaver with elongated spiral limbs inside; split skin revealing voids on body midground; rattling tools on shelf left; encroaching dark tendrils from right edge.

scenes.title: Tunnel of Cosmic Threads
scenes.text: I crawl into the utility tunnel. Pipes groan, moving like veins in a colossal organism. The quiet is oppressive, anticipation of revelation building. Darkness weaves threads around me, symbolic of transformations tying flesh to the stars. My muscles knot, shifting under skin. A voice echoes: 'Follow the weave to freedom... or oblivion.' Light flickers ahead.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Narrow utility tunnel extending forward; groaning pipes along left wall; weaving dark threads across path center; knotted muscle reflection in puddle foreground right; faint light glow at far end back.

scenes.title: Scalpel's Defiance
scenes.text: I seize the scalpel. The darkness recoils, but my hand morphs—fingers fusing into blades, a restrained burst of blood. Tension shatters in the struggle. Objects fly at me, but I slash through. The vast forces retreat, revealing an exit. I stumble out, changed but free. The cosmos whispers farewell.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Held scalpel in foreground hand; recoiling dark tendrils center midground; fused finger blades visible on hand; flying instruments scattered left; open exit door at back right.

scenes.title: Table of Remaking
scenes.text: I lie on the table. Instruments descend, carving into me with precise, graphic incisions that bloom like stars. My body transforms, expanding into infinite forms. The darkness absorbs me, tension dissolving into vast nothingness. A final whisper: 'Welcome to eternity.'
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Descending instruments above chest center; blooming incisions on skin foreground; expanding body parts midground left; absorbing dark clouds right; starry voids in wounds back.

scenes.title: Revelation's Exit
scenes.text: I reach the light. It bursts, revealing the hospital as a mere speck in cosmic vastness—flesh horrors but illusions of greater entities. Tension releases in understanding. I banish the darkness with newfound knowledge, stepping into the world anew. The whispers fade.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Bursting light at tunnel end center; cosmic vastness vista beyond midground; fading dark tendrils left; symbolic flesh illusions on walls right; open exit foreground back.

scenes.title: Threads of Oblivion
scenes.text: I let the threads bind me. They pull, twisting my form into knots of bone and sinew, graphic yet contained agony. The darkness consumes, erasing all in its incomprehensible hunger. Silence eternal claims me.
scenes.image_prompt: Vintage photo realism, film grain, authentic photography, cinematic first-person perspective, through your eyes, warm flickering candlelight, dancing shadows, black and white monochrome, grayscale tones, subtle film grain. Binding threads around body center; twisted bone knots midground; consuming dark mass left; erased forms in shadows right; eternal silence void back.
